bibl.title: The Western Desert of Egypt. An Explorer's Handbook. Maps and Illustrations by Vivienne GROVES and Lyla PINCH BROCK.
bibl.publisher: The American University in Cairo Press
bibl.note: Preface. - 1. The Natural World. - 2. The People and Explorers of the Desert. - 3. Kharga Oasis. - 4. Dakhla. - 5. Farafra. - 6. Bahariya. - 7. Fayoum. - 8. Al-Diffa (the Northern Coast). - 9. Siwa. - Les sections 3-9 comportent un aperçu historique de l'époque pharaonique à nos jours.
VIVIAN Cassandra, The Western Desert of Egypt. An Explorer's Handbook. Maps and Illustrations by Vivienne GROVES and Lyla PINCH BROCK.
Cairo, The American University in Cairo Press, 1999, 8°, xviii-423 pp., tabl., figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 977-424-527-X. £ég. 90.
